DOC.brief_title: Randomized Study Simple Weight Loss Program Obese Patients With Obstructive Sleep Apnea
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study determine weight loss intervention aim lifestyle modification ( dietary education , food diary pedometer ) result weight loss patient mild-moderate obstructive sleep apnea ( OSA ) compare usual patient care . The secondary purpose study determine amount weight loss achieve 6 month period result improvement snore symptoms frequency apnea overnight monitoring . Primary Objective - To determine weight loss intervention aim lifestyle modification ( dietary education , food diary pedometer ) result weight loss patient mild-moderate OSA compare usual care . - To determine amount weight loss achieve 6 month period result improvement objective measure sleep disorder breathing ( AHI ) . Secondary Objective - To determine weight loss achieve 6 month result improvement OSA symptom ( e.g. , snore , sleepiness ) quality life . - To determine metabolic parameter ( e.g. , lipid , glucose ) improve . - To determine improvement sleep structure oxygenation sleep .
